snippet: Johan Santana, who is owed $25.5 million this season, has not pitched in a game this spring and may not be ready for opening day.
abstract: Johan Santana, who is owed $25.5 million this season, has not pitched in a game this spring and may not be ready for opening day.

headline.main: Santana Is Biggest Question Among Several Facing Mets Rotation
headline.print_headline:
Arm Concerns? Santana
Is Leader in the Clubhouse
